Highly not recommended. Support is essentially non-existent. Been having random disconnection issues for a while, without any problems on my end as connection is stable and I am on a wired internet connection. Yet, DBD frequently disconnects randomly in matches, resulting in the increasing DC penalty. Furthermore, hackers are getting more prolific, and are actually proud of cheating in the game, especially since barely anything is done to stop them. The community is also extremely toxic, with some of the most toxic people being revered as fog whisperers (DBD partners). 

If you want to get this game, consider it only during the sales. It is not worth the money otherwise.

Edit (8/12/2021):

Yesterday's games were the last straw for me. I have uninstalled the game and would encourage more people to do so since the data is all that BHVR cares about. 4-5 games in a row with hackers, one of which had a full team of 4 hackers. Instant heals, teleport, instant boom totems, instant gen completion, fast wiggle free, unlimited flashlight, etc. This is absolutely ridiculous. And BHVR had the gall to ask for people to vote them for a steam awards?! Are you that thick-skinned?!

TL;DR: Don't get this game, even if it's free.
